title: ZOMBI v1.1
body:
ZOMBI v1.1


Genres/Tags: Action, Survival, First-person, 3D, Horror, Zombies
Companies: Ubisoft Montpellier / Ubisoft Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI9
Original Size: 20.4 GB
Repack Size: 3.6 GB

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on ZOMBI-CODEX ISO release: codex-zombi.iso (21,390,327,808 bytes)
  • ZOMBI.Update.v1.10-ALI213 (483 MB) installed over
  • CODEX crack replaced by ALI213 one, moved to NoDVD folder. LumaEmu crack is also available in NoDVD folder just in case
  • Uplay Awards unlocker for ALI213 crack available in NoDVD folder (copy save files over from Profile folder after the first game launch)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 20.4 to 3.6 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~10 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~20 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 21 GB (up to 26 GB during intallation)
  • GUI & audio languages be changed in game settings separately
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

You’re still breathing, for now, but how long will you survive the labyrinth of London’s streets and underground canals, abandoned by the outside world and surrounded by infected? The horrifying remains of humanity, ravaged by the terrifying disease, are shuffling through the streets, waiting at every turn to prey on your living flesh.

The nail-biting survival experience of ZombiU™ has been upgraded for download on next-gen consoles and PC. ZOMBI takes the power of the latest generation of hardware to bring you a new level of horror. Test your will to survive, but beware: death is permanent, and one wrong move can cause you to lose everything.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous repacks of ZOMBI.
